title: AWS Networking to Azure Virtual Networks: Network Operations and Content Delivery
description: Master network operations by implementing AWS VPC networking and migrating to Azure Virtual Networks with advanced routing, security, content delivery, and network performance optimization across both platforms.
learningObjectives: Design and implement advanced VPC and Virtual Network architectures
Configure network security with security groups, NACLs, and NSGs
Implement content delivery networks with CloudFront and Azure CDN
Build network connectivity solutions including VPN and ExpressRoute
Configure DNS management and traffic routing strategies
Optimize network performance and troubleshoot connectivity issues
prerequisites: Completion of SOA-C02 Monitoring, Reliability, Deployment, and Security labs
Understanding of networking fundamentals and TCP/IP concepts
Basic knowledge of DNS, routing, and network security
Familiarity with load balancing and traffic distribution concepts
businessScenario: GlobalNet Solutions operates a distributed application architecture serving customers worldwide with strict performance and availability requirements. They need to implement advanced networking solutions across AWS and Azure platforms, including multi-region connectivity, content delivery optimization, network security, and hybrid cloud connectivity while ensuring compliance and cost optimization.

sections.title: Advanced Network Architecture and Connectivity
topics: AWS VPC design patterns and multi-VPC connectivity
Azure Virtual Network architecture and VNet peering
AWS Transit Gateway for centralized connectivity
Azure Virtual WAN for global network architecture
Hybrid connectivity with Direct Connect and ExpressRoute

Setup network segmentation and micro-segmentation strategies

deliverables: Multi-VPC architecture with Transit Gateway connectivity
Azure Virtual Network with Virtual WAN implementation

sections.title: Network Security and Access Control
topics: AWS Security Groups and Network ACLs configuration
Azure Network Security Groups and application security groups
AWS Network Firewall and traffic inspection
Azure Firewall and network security policies
Network-based threat detection and prevention

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Network Security
tasks.description: Setup layered network security with advanced threat protection
steps: Configure AWS Security Groups with least privilege access principles
Setup Azure Network Security Groups with equivalent security policies
Implement AWS Network Firewall for advanced traffic inspection

Setup network-based intrusion detection and prevention
Implement network security monitoring and alerting
deliverables: Security Groups and NSGs with least privilege configuration
Network Firewall and Azure Firewall implementation
Network threat detection and prevention setup
Network security monitoring and alerting framework

sections.title: Content Delivery and Performance Optimization
topics: Amazon CloudFront distribution configuration and optimization
Azure CDN and Front Door global distribution
AWS Global Accelerator for application performance
Content caching strategies and cache optimization
Performance monitoring and analytics for content delivery

Implement AWS Global Accelerator for application performance optimization

deliverables: Azure CDN and Front Door global distribution setup

CDN security and DDoS protection configuration

topics: Amazon Route 53 DNS management and health checks
Azure DNS and traffic management strategies
Advanced routing policies and failover configurations
DNS-based load balancing and geographic routing
DNS security and performance optimization

troubleshooting.issue: Complex network connectivity issues across multiple regions and clouds
troubleshooting.solution: Implement comprehensive network monitoring and logging, use network diagnostic tools, create network documentation and topology maps, and implement automated connectivity testing

troubleshooting.issue: Performance issues with content delivery and application latency
troubleshooting.solution: Optimize CDN configuration and caching strategies, implement intelligent routing, use performance monitoring and analytics, and optimize network paths and protocols

troubleshooting.issue: Network security vulnerabilities and compliance gaps
troubleshooting.solution: Implement layered security controls, use automated security scanning, implement network segmentation, and maintain security baselines and compliance monitoring
